title: Do you want iLAVA rewards pool back or no? 重新设置iLAVA会员的奖励池？
body:
As our community request, they would like us to restart the iLAVA reward program on BSC. Daily rewards level will also be voted once this gets passed.
社区要求，我们重新解冻在BSC上面的LAVA，并且启动iLAVA的会员奖励。每天奖励数目也会有iLAVA会员投票决定。请您投票是否同意解冻iLAVA的会员激励代币库？
choices: Yes 是的，请重新启动iLAVA每天固定奖励
No 不需要，请继续解冻所有除了流动盘以外的LAVA代币
author: 0x6227dA29eb9dDD4F1aa004689B4120118Ec0D9b6
